AUTHOR: Kowlin
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Sentry
This cog allows interaction between Red and Sentry for error logging.

For setup instructions please see the GitHub Wiki(<https://github.com/Kowlin/refactored-cogs/wiki>)
For support: <https://support.kowlin.xyz>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/kowlin>
NAME: Sentry
SHORT: Log your bot errors to Sentry.
DESCRIPTION: Log your bot errors to Sentry. This cog will log all errors that the bot catches on a bot wide level to Sentry. Includes tag support.
